row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.PUSH_APPLICATION@GENERIC
row.description: Push an existing application to Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Manifest Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_MANIFEST_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Path to content" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Docker Image" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_DOCKER_IMG#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Buildpack" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_BUILDPACK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Stack" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_STACK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Routing" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_ROUTING#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_DOMAIN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Hostname" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_HOSTNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Instances" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_INSTANCES#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Disk Limit" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_DISK_LMT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Memory Limit" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_MEMORY_LMT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Start after pushing" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_START_CHOICE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Startup Command" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_START_CMD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Start Timeout" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_START_TIMEOUT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Health check type" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_HEALTH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO
:IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# ="cf push "
! Application name ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#")
! Manifest Path ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_MANIFEST_PATH# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_MANIFEST_PATH : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -f &UC4RB_CF_MANIFEST_PATH#") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --no-manifest") : ENDIF
! Path to content ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_APP_PATH# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_APP_PATH : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -p &UC4RB_CF_APP_PATH#") : ENDIF
! Docker Image ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_DOCKER_IMG# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_DOCKER_IMG : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --docker-image &UC4RB_CF_DOCKER_IMG#") : ENDIF
! Buildpack ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_BUILDPACK# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_BUILDPACK : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -b &UC4RB_CF_BUILDPACK#") : ENDIF
! Stack ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_STACK# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_STACK : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -s &UC4RB_CF_STACK#") : ENDIF
! Routing : IF &UC4RB_CF_ROUTING# = "Map to random hostname" : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --random-route") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_CF_ROUTING# = "No mapping" : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --no-route") : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_CF_ROUTING# = "Map to root domain" : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --no-hostname") : ENDIF
! Domain ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_DOMAIN# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_DOMAIN : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -d &UC4RB_CF_DOMAIN#") : ENDIF
! Hostname ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_HOSTNAME# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_HOSTNAME : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -n &UC4RB_CF_HOSTNAME#") : ENDIF
! Instances ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_INSTANCES# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_INSTANCES : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -i &UC4RB_CF_INSTANCES#") : ENDIF
! Disk Limit ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_DISK_LMT# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_DISK_LMT : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -k &UC4RB_CF_DISK_LMT#") : ENDIF
! Memory Limit ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_MEMORY_LMT# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_MEMORY_LMT : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -m &UC4RB_CF_MEMORY_LMT#") : ENDIF
! Start after pushing : IF &UC4RB_CF_START_CHOICE# = "NO" : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --no-start") : ENDIF
! Startup Command ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_START_CMD# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_START_CMD : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -c &UC4RB_CF_START_CMD#") : ENDIF
! Start Timeout ! --------------------- ESCAPE SPECIAL CHAR ---------------------------- : IF &UC4RB_CF_START_TIMEOUT# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_START_TIMEOUT : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " -t &UC4RB_CF_START_TIMEOUT#") : ENDIF
! Health check type : IF &UC4RB_CF_HEALTH# = "Port" : SET &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#, " --health-check-type port") : ENDIF
! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF PUSH_APP COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF PUSH_APP COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_PUSH_APP_CLA# :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** PUSH APPLICATION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** PUSH APPLICATION ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
